amendment.description: To authorize appropriations for sewer overflow control grants.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2185 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2185 proposed by Senator Bond for Senator Levin to Amendment SA 2150. (consideration: CR S14520-14524; text: CR S14520) To authorize appropriations for sewer overflow control grants.
